title: Pluto's Christmas tree
creator_credit: Jack Hannah and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: The second last entry in the theatrical Mickey Mouse series which officially began in 1928. As in many of his latter cartoons, Mickey is largely a background foil of others, in this case Pluto and Chip ‘n’ Dale. Animated by George Kreisl, Fred Moore, Bill Justice, Volus Jones. Music by Joseph S. Dubin.
